snippet: John Littig and Lynne Rosen, who offered inspirational advice once a month on WBAI-FM, were found dead in their apartment in Park Slope, Brooklyn.
abstract: John Littig and Lynne Rosen, who offered inspirational advice once a month on WBAI-FM as hosts of radio self-help program, are found dead in their apartment in Park Slope, Brooklyn, victims of apparent suicide.
lead_paragraph: John Littig and Lynne Rosen, who offered inspirational advice once a month on WBAI-FM, were found dead in their apartment in Park Slope, Brooklyn.

headline.seo: 2 Radio Show Hosts Who Preached Tenacity Kill Themselves
headline.main: 2 Hosts of Self-Help Program Kill Themselves in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: 2 Hosts of Self-Help Program Kill Themselves in Brooklyn
